Text: What's next? So exciting!

Grrr... Delta, acting like you're on a holiday...
You'd better give me the reaction I'm looking for.
Delta is very athletic, so it has to be at the next one.

Because the route that Delta is taking now is
actually...the pitfall zone!
If you don't watch your step, you'll fall into an abyss!
La la laâ€•

Damn! I think she got lucky avoiding the first one...
But these kind of failures happen!

I dug and dug and dug, so she will get stuck! Then,
in that moment, you will meet my expectations!

My hopes fell into the pitfall. Her fingers grabbed
onto a protrusion in the rockface, and she missed
danger by a hair's breadth!

No, at the next one she will stop in the air, like a
comic scene you only see in anime.

Like those characters who freeze for a few seconds
before they fall! Like they can get out of it by
swimming toward the sky!
Gah?!
All right, now...
Hah!
Wh-What?! She took a step back and avoided the pit?!
Whoops, that could have been dangerous.
Wow, sooo deep... Glad I didn't fall in!

Aren't your physical abilities too good?! Why
didn't you fall in just now?!
My tail moved, so it was right to jump.

You guessed! If you can avoid such things just
through intuition, it's torture for the one who
devised this trial!

If I fell, it would have been really difficult to
climb back out...

No, we're nowhere near the stage where it's hard to
climb out! If you don't fall down in the first place,
then the whole plan falls through!

Now is not the time to show off your physical
abilities! You do that after falling!

Rocks, snakes, traps! That's why Boss man showed me
this cave.
Right, I better start being careful now!

Argh! You're avoiding all of the pitfalls I so
painstakingly set up...

But once she's fallen in once, she'll be on guard
for a while...right?
R-Right, it isn't over yet... To the next trial!
Huh? Is this the end of the cave?
Is this the deepest part...? Oh look, a bridge!

Now that I think about it, the suspension bridge is
probably a little too telling...! I think even Delta
would realize this isn't a natural cave.
There's a bridge in a place like this, lucky!

...You don't have any suspicions about that?
That alone betrays my expectations.

Well, forget that... Can Delta get across this
suspension bridge?
Ooh, it's really shaky.
Gently... Easy now...

Grr, I set up that bridge so that any movement should
get amplified.

The more carefully you try to move, the more it
should swing, but at this rate she's going to get
across.

Right, time for me to directly intervene. Let's cut
that rope...
And flick some slime...now!
Whoa!
Why's the bridge is suddenly moving? Why?!
Grrgh...
I see... One of the bridge ropes behind me snapped!

Right, so now you hold on to the falling bridge,
crash into the opposite ledge, hold tight and climb
up...

That's the scene I'm looking for! And now...the
ledge!
Gahh!!
Ack! I'm crossing!!

Wha...? You're using the run-through-the-air-with-
limbs-flailing move?!

Whew... Th-That was a bit dangerous...! This Cave of
Piles is hard!

The whole image was...amazing, I mean, it was
something I've always wanted to see...

But somehow it wasn't what I had envisioned. I really
did choose the wrong person...

No, if I made Gamma or someone else do it, I am sure
everything would be exactly as expected... Even then,
it would completely lack any element of surprise.
Okay, onward!
The next one won't be so easy.

The next one might be easily cleared by someone
like Gamma, but for Delta, it will be a completely
different kettle of fish!

...Ah, I wanted to follow her, but the bridge is
gone. Only way to get across is to jump it now.
